activities:
Personal information is stored for the purposes of granting system access & for completion of transactions across a secure network. Information includes:
· User’s Name
· User’s work address
· User’s work telephone & fax numbers
· User’s e-mail address
corpofftitle1: SVP Global Sales and Account Management
eucountries: Finland, Portugal, Spain, Austria, France, Netherlands, Sweden, Belgium, Denmark, Germany, Ireland, Norway, United Kingdom, Greece, Italy, Luxembourg
privacyprograms: member of Chemical Industry Data Exchange (CIDX) Cyber Security Practices, Standards & Technology Initiative
recoursemech: Unresolved complaints can be brought to the attention of the board’s Security Compliance Committee for resolution. A coporate officer (as defined in the organization’s privacy policy) has the responsibility to ensure compliance. The company’s board of directors, through its Security Compliance Committee, provides oversight for this function. Trade-Ranger agrees to utilize the American Arbitration Association to investigate unresolved complaints.
